Name: BTD6 Script API
Author: KosmicDev
Description: BTD6 Script Api is a barebones api for loading mods into BTD6 without any .NET knowledge

Name: BTD6.Jet
Author: KosmicDev
Description: All towers and base game objects will be logged as json files for easy modification!

Name: Nostalgic Village
Author: Baydock
Description: Allows user to toggle between BTD5 and BTD6 top path village attacks

Name: BTD6E Leaked
Author: KosmicDev & Baydock
Description: Leaked version of the BTD6 Expansion
Tags: UI, Overhaul, New Tower, New Bloon, New Map, Cheat, Gameplay, Utility, Other

Name: No Outlet
Author: Baydock
Description: First ever fully functional map mod.

Name: Massive Mod Collection
Author: KosmicDev
Description: Compilation of one off mods. (Used to be named Massive Mod)

Name: Bonus Bloon
Author: Baydock
Description: Adds a bonus bloon that has the chance to appear at the beginning of each round.

Name: Damage Costs Monkey
Author: Lil Spiderman
Description: This mod makes the game solely reliant on how much cash you have. Simply put, bloons leaked costs you cash instead of lives, and if you get to 0 cash then it's game over!

Name: Money Stuff
Author: Lil Spiderman
Description: Cheat mod that will continuously give you cash until the game is over. (SinglePlayer Only!)

Name: All Fortifed
Author: Baydock
Description: Adds a fortified variant to every bloon. To add even more excitement, a new "All Fortified" toggle has been added to the challenge editor that makes every bloon fortified, similar to the "All Camo" and "All Regrow" toggles. Feel free to use the new toggle to make challenges for others to play, as long as they have this mod as well.

Name: Minus One Damage
Author: DatJaneDoe
Description: Everything does 1 fewer layers of damage (except damage-over-time effects). Example: Dart Monkeys do 0 damage, but Crossbows do 2 damage. Better make use of Alchemist Brews! Intended for challenge seekers.

Name: Send Next Round
Author: DatJaneDoe
Description: Tap F6 in any game mode to send the next round. Practice races all you want!

Name: Pets Follow Mouse
Author: HemiDemiSemiPresent
Description: Pets will follow your mouse. Oh and they have lazers

Name: Ace Micro
Author: HemiDemiSemiPresent
Description: Removes WingMonkey and Centered Path targetting from Monkey Ace because they suck.
